name: Peacock Plus
description: Legacy content restoration and Progression clean up with QOL changes.

english.CHALLENGEPACK_PHOSPHORUS_WRAPPER_DESC:
Complete all the Best Case Scenario challenges:
  • The Brief Case of Charles Dexter Ward
  • The Baggage We Carry
  • Another Suitcase in Another Face
  • The Curious Case for Sophia Washington
english.CHALLENGEPACK_PHOSPHORUS_PIER_GUARDS_DES: • Hide the bodies of all 6 guards on the pier, without getting spotted, after knocking them out by throwing a briefcase.
english.CHALLENGEPACK_PHOSPHORUS_MORGUE_TO_CRYPT: The Brief Case of Charles Dexter Ward
While wearing the Burial Robes, pick up a briefcase in the Morgue and enter the Crypt carrying it.
english.CHALLENGEPACK_PHOSPHORUS_BRIEFCASE SNIPE:
• Carry a briefcase to the roof of the Citadel Tower.
  • While on the roof of the Citadel Tower, shoot and eliminate any target with a sniper rifle.
english.CHALLENGEPACK_PHOSPHORUS_BOMB_CASE_NAME: A Curious Case for Sophia Washington
english.CHALLENGEPACK_PHOSPHORUS_BOMB_CASE_DESC:
• Eliminate Sophia Washington with a concealed explosive device, while she is in the Security Room.
  • No visible explosive devices in the Security Room.
english.UI_CHALLENGES_NOEL_MASTER_SANTA_DESC_2: Complete all challenges in the 'Secret Santa' Challenge Pack.
